original_text:
And the strong shall become tinder,
    and his work a spark,
and both of them shall burn together,
    with none to quench them.
korean_text: 강한 자는 삼오라기 같고 그의 행위는 불티 같아서 함께 탈 것이나 끌 사람이 없으리라

sentences.original_text: And the strong shall become tinder
and both of them shall burn together
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘 모두 함께 불타 버리리라
